channel.title: Viatrix the rando
channel.description:
chaos unfolds amidst these prim rectangles
look i wanted a place to put short form text and this is the place i decided. you can like poke around in the source code and stuff. ssss.xsl is the most important file.
you probably know i'm on the ğŸ•¸ï¸ at https://viatrix.is-hella.gay

item.description: it's only Yesterweb if it comes from the Yesterweb region of France, otherwise it's just sparkling web revival

this is just how i perceived the term

item.description: I'm a self-proclaimed GIF expert. I'm a recreational linguist. I'm gay in a platonic way. I'm the aciest ace to grace this space. I've been described as â€œdelightfully chaoticâ€ and as â€œan HTML godâ€. I'm consistently inconsistent.
using powers of 2 for conversion calculations that's so cool wtf
item.category: things others have said about me

item.description:
(Setup to this double joke: At the time, the #newspaper channel consisted entirely of images of Susan accompanied by the text â€œSo coolâ€)
Rose: The conversation in #newspaper is really solid today.
Rea: I think you mean it's really cool.
Viatrix: If it's cooler than the freezing point then it's solid

item.description: Adam decides he has a crush on Brad. He then updates his link as follows: <a href="http://brad-log.example.org/" rel="met friend crush">Brad</a>
high school: where the students were high and i was entirely unaware :p
*faux-gasp* my goodness! straightness? in publicâ€½ scandalous! :p
greetings, guys gals gays and guls

The Internet, and its various sub-media and related media (Usenet, email, World-Wide Web, MUCKs and MUDs, IRC, FTP sites, and gods know what else), has quickly become a leading medium of communication among furries
the best method to get flexible legs: not having nail clippers
my greatest feat of ADHD yet: having a beep sound playing every second then forgetting about it between beeps

for a while my brain's been shortcutting to a soundbyte â€œcartoons, cartoons, they're better than spoonsâ€, which is most likely an accidental variation on Tom singing â€œharpoons, harpoons, they're better than spoonsâ€ in Eddsworld
though whether cartoons are better than spoons might depend on what one means

watching cartoons can be compared to watching the utensil <reference to="https://youtu.be/AYEm_JuV8AM">cartoons are better at least until 2023</reference>
surely the act of spooning could be done while watching cartoons, potentially increasing overall enjoyment
and spoons as a metaphor for energy are probably a required component for watching cartoons

i thought â€œto espouseâ€ meant like â€œto declare enthusiasticallyâ€ or thereabouts, but apparently it means â€œto become/get married toâ€ and/or, the use which probably led to my interpretation, â€œto accept, support, or take on as one's own (an idea/cause)â€
and an e-spouse is your spouse on the 'net :p
we're here, we're queer, we can't drink beer, finding a career fills us with fear

remember kids, if there's both a CSS solution and a JS solution, take the CSS solution *hops on a motorcycle and rides away into the sunset* *(in reality i am not licensed to operate any motor vehicle but just ignore that ok)*

...i summarized my life from grade 2-12 because i recently reÃ«stablished contact with a former grade 2 classmate and i realize i may sound incredibly overpowered in my summary
â€œi won a spelling contest without practicing lolâ€
â€œi ended up in a college-level Python course which was pretty easy lolâ€
â€œi hacked the blog system which all students had to useâ€
â€œi am immune to heartbreakâ€

ğŸ‘©ğŸ»â€ğŸ¦± ã‚´ã‚´ã‚´ã‚´ã‚´ã‚´ã‚´
yep i feel like some sort of anime villain now lol
how is our plucky young hero going to defeat the Internet Rando Extraordinaire or whatever
what even is my villainous plan
imagining myself in a 90s anime just surrounded by beige desktops and typing on all their keyboards
and you bet my glasses somehow always have glare on them

ok lemme explain this amazing plan i just invented:
i'm going to make a knockoff of Marriage
very similar product, but more gay and poly

instead of a "wedding" you have an event that looks really similar to a wedding but it's not a wedding it's my <s>completely original</s> product

ğŸ¤µâ€â™‚ï¸ğŸ¤µğŸ¤µâ€â™€ï¸ğŸ‘°â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ‘°ğŸ‘°â€â™€ï¸

ok so we make marriage 2 electric boogaloo like worthy of even more trust than marriage 1

in addition to marriage 2 electric boogaloo rings, other options are marriage 2 electric boogaloo collars, marriage 2 electric boogaloo matching t-shirts, uhh i can't think of more ideas but there should definitely be more options in marriage 2 electric boogaloo (working title)

marriage 2 electric boogaloo swords!

everything is optional and nothing is exclusive

except i guess if you're marrying 2 electric boogaloo, then the one non-optional thing is marrying 2 electric boogaloo itself, but only because we're acting under the assumption you already chose to marry 2 electric boogaloo
i may have mothed so much that i'm mothing after mothers day is over
near-homographic, by which i mean they're nearly spelled the same, not that they're nearly graphic gays
it is clear i am not fluent in the language of eyes
chirping is roleplaying the greek letter Ï‡
data strongly suggests the dictionary is a joke for humour purposes and never actually existed
item.category: since then, â€œa joke for humour purposesâ€ has become a recurring phrase in my idiolect

item.description: flurch frenting
my fursona is an aspirin

snakes and ladders has randomness but post office has neither
.. ok i meant neither randomness or skill
though it has neither snakes or ladders
leap negative zeroths wouldn't make sense because then leap days would be anti-leap-minutes
<details><summary>(caution: sexual reference)</summary>plot twist: strip scrabble turns out to be identical to regular scrabble because nobody knew when they were supposed to strip</details>
<details><summary>(caution: sexual reference)</summary>legs being sexy is a myth made by pants companies to sell pants made with less fabric</details>
<details><summary>(caution: sexual reference)</summary>i didn't see any porn but i am now racing. against porn.</details>

A running joke I have is to claim phrases are my new password, based on correct horse battery staple.
  • "no Javascript whatsoever unlike other modern webring frameworks" is my new password
  • "updated ezine egirl webring iframe background colour" is my new password
  • 'current confirmed cuddler count' is very alliterative and is my new password :p
  • "common character attribute combination" is my new password
  • "can't independently determine blushworthiness" is my new password :p
  • "syndication feed format history" and "image formats' internal intricacies" are my new passwords
  • "tangentialy explained disinformation's etymology" is my new password
  • equally calibred vernacular equivalents (which is also my new password)
  • large thin flexible rectangle is my new password
  • "rotating circle crisis averted" is my new password
  • "attempted amplifying hat deformations" gives me "correct horse battery staple" vibes
    (presumably the originator, from 2021-10-10)
